tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Most efficient doctor I have come across he is perfectionist great team and most advance dental treatment is provided and  higene standard is excellent

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am amazed with how meticulous and responsible Dr Husain Harianawala is. I had severe pain and thought it's ulcers when my Dr refered me to Dr Husain (I had gum damage). He and his team identified the details and very confidently prepared me for the wisdom tooth extraction. Dentists have always been a scare for me and I am so relieved and confident with this extraction. I didn't feel a bit of pain and just pressure as the Dr had promised. He and his team did such a smooth and painless extraction of such a complicated tooth and treated my gum damage too. I just felt all my pain go away so soon instantly as soon as the extraction was done. Though I had heard about the pain after the anasthesia is gone, I didn't feel any pain the same day and throughout the entire 12 days. Just little swelling for a day which is normal and it went away with ice packs. I also flew on the 5th day and returned too. I didn't face any pain, no bleeding, no dry socket throughout.
He designed my medicines schedule according to my schedule.
He explained the after care so well.
He and his entire team were so careful, pleasant and responsible. Advanced instruments for imaging and treatment...
His cartoons on TV were an added pleasure.
Even the stitches removal that I dreaded but I was confident that it's him so I won't feel it and the same happened. No pain at all even after the numbness is gone. It feels like nothing ever happened.
Overall, I'm very happy with the treatment. Though it may seem expensive comparatively but I find Dr Husain and his team's work worth. I would recommend him. I am looking forward for my further treatment too.

Thank you Dr for the painless experience and taking my pain away and also my fear. :)
God bless....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I, being a Delhite, was lucky to have my teeth problems fixed by an expert periodontist and implantologist, Dr. Hussain Harainwala of The Dental Bond, Mumbai. I am very impressed by his surgery, which relieved me of a prolonged gums problem, besides a longtime solution to my teeth. He is a  very humble, knowledgeable and experienced Dentist, the rarest.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dental Bond is a very high tech clinic where patient is explained at every step what and why a procedure will be done. Comfort of the patient is paramount and it's unlike any other dental clinic I have been to with a very calm atmosphere. Its so comfortable I almost fall asleep in the dentists chair üòä I would recommend it for best quality diagnosis and treatment especially for patients who value quality over budget and are willing to pay higher for comfort and excellence. This clinic also keeps impeccable dental records for each patient and values time. So there is no unnecessary visits or waiting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have forever been scared of dental treatments however Dr Hussain and team made it look like a piece of cake. I had visited him for tooth extraction and tooth fillings. He managed to extract all four wisdom teeth and a extra tooth without any pain. The entire experience stress free, they played cartoons for me while the procedure was going on! The entire team of the Dental Bond is warm and friendly and caring. They kept reassuring me throughout the procedure and Miss Heena followed up telephonically post the treatment. I cannot think of a better Dentist for my future treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: It was  really an awesome experience with Dr.Husain sir and other staffs as well in the clinic.Everything happened very well.The surroundings of the clinic is really awesome and makes you feel relaxed and satisfied.I would love to ask everyone to give a visit to "The Dental Bond"clinic if anyone is willing for a dental treatment.And yes the words are not enough to compliment the works of Doctor as its beyond that and here,its just a small feedback to help the people to get a right doctor...üòçüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Periodontal Flap Surgery,Dental Surgery,Flexible Partial/Complete Denture,Bleeding Gums Treatment,
review: Went around visiting like a dozen dentists but wasn‚Äôt feeling right to start the procedures with any of them. My condition was more then serious and needed immediate treatment. Finally got in touch with Dr Husain Harianawala and guess what? I am now a person with totally healthy mouth and I feel very confident about myself. And what needed was a doctor who could see us with a lot of patience, care, understanding and council in the best way since my mental state required that and doctor Husain is just perfect in handling all of that. Not to forget that the entire team is so cordial and caring with every patient. My surgeries were painless. I am overwhelmed. Would highly recommend The Dental Bond.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited today for check up of dental implant done about a year age.Amiable,polite and highly knowledgeable Dr and it is always a pleasure to visit clinic and interact with Dr's. there.The new clinic is made tastefully with all latest gadgets for dental treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I met with an accident which completely smashed my upper lip causing immense trauma to my upper teeth. I was petrified! I rang up Dr Husain and though it was pretty late, he waited up for me and did a splendid job of re aligning and stitching the torn upper lip. 
The Dental Bond is a state of art facility. Both Dr Farhat   and Dr Husain Harianawala are perfectionists. 
Truly grateful to The Dental Bond for being there. 
The Dental Bond is a go to clinic for any and every dental need.
